member.name: M:NetSharp.Sockets.RawSocketClient.Connect(System.Net.EndPoint@)
member.summary: Connects the client to the specified end point. If called on a -based client, this method configures the default remote host, and the client will ignore any packets not coming from this default host (i.e the given ).
member.param: The remote end point which to which to connect the client.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Sockets.RawSocketClient.ConnectAsync(System.Net.EndPoint@)
member.summary: Asynchronously connects the client to the specified end point. If called on a -based client, this method configures the default remote host, and the client will ignore any packets not coming from this default host (i.e the given ).
member.param: The remote end point which to which to connect the client.
member.returns: A representing the connection attempt.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Sockets.RawSocketClient.Receive(System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Byte[],System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags)
member.summary: Listens for data from the specified endpoint, placing the data in the given buffer. On connection-oriented protocols, the given endpoint is ignored in favour of the default remote host set up by a call to or .
member.param: The remote endpoint from which data should be received. Ignored on connection-oriented protocols.
The buffer into which data is to be received.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.
member.returns: The result of the receive operation.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Sockets.RawSocketClient.ReceiveAsync(System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Memory{System.Byte},System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags)
member.summary: Asynchronously listens for data from the specified endpoint, placing the data in the given buffer. On connection-oriented protocols, the given endpoint is ignored in favour of the default remote host set up by a call to or .
member.param: The remote endpoint from which data should be received. Ignored on connection-oriented protocols.
The buffer into which data is to be received.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.
member.returns: The result of the asynchronous receive operation.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Sockets.RawSocketClient.Send(System.Net.EndPoint@,System.Byte[],System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags)
member.summary: Sends the data in the given buffer to the specified endpoint. On connection-oriented protocols, the given endpoint is ignored in favour of the default remote host set up by a call to or .
member.param: The remote endpoint to which data should be sent. Ignored on connection-oriented protocols.
The buffer containing the outgoing data to be sent.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.
member.returns: The result of the send operation.

member.name: M:NetSharp.Sockets.RawSocketClient.SendAsync(System.Net.EndPoint@,System.ReadOnlyMemory{System.Byte},System.Net.Sockets.SocketFlags)
member.summary: Asynchronously sends the data in the given buffer to the specified endpoint. On connection-oriented protocols, the given endpoint is ignored in favour of the default remote host set up by a call to or .
member.param: The remote endpoint to which data should be sent. Ignored on connection-oriented protocols.
The buffer containing the outgoing data to be sent. The contents of the buffer are copied to an internally maintained buffer when the call is made.
The socket flags associated with the send operation.
member.returns: The result of the asynchronous send operation.
